root: ^Constantine, please, don't tell your son about it; we had an agreement, remember?
^Yes, he is a smart lad, but this labyrinth is too dangerous. Your son will still achieve...
^What do you mean, my notes? They are long gone. I left them in my old house, which I sold ten years ago. The new owners most likely threw everything away. There was nothing important in them!
^Please, you might regret this! Constantine, hello? Hello?
